name: Q-WARE
description:
Q-WARE is a learning application in the form of an educational game designed to help players recognize the hardware in the computer's CPU.

Q-WARE has two main features, namely "Daftar Hardware" and "Permainan", consisting of two modes, as well as one extra feature, namely "Penghargaan".

1. Daftar Hardware
"Daftar Hardware" is a learning feature in Q-WARE that can be accessed via the "Daftar Hardware" button. Players will be faced with hardware that players can choose for themselves. They will be directed to the material page, where in Q-WARE the introduction material is delivered with the help of a 3D model of the hardware.

For now there are 9 hardware that players can choose.
- Motherboard
- Processor
- Random Access Memory
- Graphic Card
- Hard Disk
- Heatsink
- Power Supply
- Optical Disk Drive
- Solid State Drive 2. Permainan
"Permainan" is a feature in Q-WARE where players can hone their knowledge. There are two game modes presented, namely "Kuis" and "Puzzle Rakit". These two games have different goals and rules, but both are made using the concept of time trials.

"The longer the player plays the game, the less of a reward the player receives." 3. Penghargaan
"Penghargaan" is a feature that displays the achievements that players have earned during the game. Each award has its own conditions to be open.

NOTE: For now, Q-WARE only available in Bahasa Indonesia

In Q-WARE, some assets wasn't made by developer itself.
